LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Dawnblade.label: MPQFS-85 "Dawnblade"
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Dawnblade.description: a normally ship mounted multi-role quick-firing gun system, it uses drum magazines and autoloaders to permit a high rate of fire. the removal of additional amror plating allows them to be deployed to provide heavy fire support for colonies.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Dawnblade.comps.CompRefuelabl: Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel
